description:
** Brand new and up to date Instagram course! FULLY UPDATED 2016**

Instagram: is a very cool social network/ photo sharing tool that is super fun. Instagram allows you to market and grow your business to reach thousands of new customers each and everyday. In this course you will be taught exactly how to do that.

Instagram: has more then 400 million monthly active users that is a crazy amount of traffic and user retention is at an all time high. With that many people on one plat form that is enough to convince you of the scalability and potential Instagram truly has.

Instagram allows you to connect with your customers in a very unique but very effective way:

  • Create a powerful Instagram account for your business or personal brand
  • Build strong and long lasting relationships with your followers/customers
  • Connect with thousand of potential customers everyday
  • Once the relationship is built learn to convert those followers into paying customers over and over again


Instagram overview:

Instagram can sometimes be very overwhelming, especially if you are new and have yet to make a post. I am very happy to be sharing with you the tools and techniques I have learned from industry leaders to build my account to over 10,000+ followers.  

In this course you will learn all the fundamentals of Instagram as well as an in side look at different techniques used to grow your personal brand and business brand. I have grown my brand through Instagram and have made multiple sales and have reached thousands of people and you can too. 

You will be taught Instagram promotional strategies, how to gain hundreds of followers, comments, and likes for your business or personal brand.

By the end of this course you will have the confidence to market on Instagram. You'll have valuable skills that will help you effectively build a strong community of Instagram followers that will be interested in your product or service. 

I will be giving you live demonstrations, and helpful resources to guide you through the entire process. From setting up your Instagram account, gathering a relevant following, to increasing the profit of your business and much more! 

If you are a small to medium sized business owner, entrepreneur, Udemy instructor, or someone who simply wants to grow their personal brand then this course is for you! This course is designed to show people how grow your brand and reach potential leads and make sales through Instagram.

Taking action is one of the most undertook things when it comes success, the worst guns are the gonnas, I'm gonna do this, I'm gonna do that, just take action and invest in yourself. My goal as your personal mentor so to provide value and show you how to use Instagram to better your marketing. If you are serious about stepping up your Instagram game then taking this course is going to be perfect for you. 

I look forward to seeing you inside :) 

-Evan
title: Instagram Marketing: How To Generate Leads & Grow Your Brand
